sqlMap.insert: insert into T01_SYS_UPLOAD_LOG (UPLOAD_ID, UPLOAD_DESC, UPLOAD_FILE_PATH, FILE_SIZE, USER_ID, START_DATE, END_DATE, USER_NAME) VALUES ('$uploadId$', #dataName#, '$filePath$', '$fileSize$', '$userId$', sysdate, sysdate, '$userName$')
insert into T02_DATA_INSTANCE (INST_ID, INST_NAME,INST_TABLE, CREATE_DATE, USER_ID, STATUS) values ('$instId$',#instName#,'$instTable$',sysdate,#userId#,#status#)
sqlMap.update: update T02_DATA_INSTANCE set status = '$status$',ROW_NUM='$rowNum$' where INST_ID = '$instId$'
update T01_SYS_UPLOAD_LOG set FILE_ROWNUM = '$rowNum$',is_title = '$isTitle$' where UPLOAD_ID = '$instId$'
